alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 2:25AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Locally Dense Fog Developing Over Northwest Lake County... At 225 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery and traffic cameras showed an area of dense fog had formed over northwest Lake County from south of Okahumpka to Lady Lake, including Leesburg, Lisbon, Umatilla, Tavares and Mount Dora. Visibilities had dropped to around one quarter mile in some locations. The fog will pose a hazard to drivers early this morning, and could last through at lest sunrise. Be especially careful if you will be driving on the Florida Turnpike, U.S. Highways 27 and 441, and State Roads 19 and 44. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only your low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
